mapper.sql: id, name, logo, icon_url, imgs_banner, imgs_details, car_parameters, activity_title, colors, types, activity_rules, car_prices, activity_deposit, product_status, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from c_product order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into c_product (id, name, logo, icon_url, imgs_banner, imgs_details, colors, types, car_parameters, activity_title, activity_rules, car_prices, activity_deposit, product_status, create_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{logo}, #{iconUrl}, #{imgsBanner}, #{imgsDetails}, #{colors}, #{types}, #{carParameters}, #{activityTitle}, #{activityRules}, #{carPrices}, #{activityDeposit}, #{productStatus}, #{createTime})

id,

mapper.update:
update c_product
name = #{name},
logo = #{logo},
icon_url = #{iconUrl},
imgs_banner = #{imgsBanner},
imgs_details = #{imgsDetails},
car_parameters = #{carParameters},
activity_title = #{activityTitle},
activity_rules = #{activityRules},
car_prices = #{carPrices},
colors = #{colors},
types = #{types},
activity_deposit = #{activityDeposit},
product_status = #{productStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}

update c_product set name = #{name}, logo = #{logo}, icon_url = #{iconUrl}, imgs_banner = #{imgsBanner}, imgs_details = #{imgsDetails}, car_parameters = #{carParameters}, activity_title = #{activityTitle}, activity_rules = #{activityRules}, car_prices = #{carPrices}, colors = #{colors}, types = #{types}, activity_deposit = #{activityDeposit}, product_status = #{productStatus}, create_time = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
